directions: Dissolve sugar in the water.  Add orange juice, lemonade, bananas, crushed pineapple with juice, strawberries and mix well. Pour into 9x13 inch glass pan. Freeze until solid.  When ready to serve, let it sit out for about 5 minutes before attempting to cut.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
title: Frozen Fruit Salad
